radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Combined positron-emission tomography and computed tomography (PET-CT)
radiographic_examinations.findings: Enlarged right common iliac, external iliac, and inguinal lymph nodes; the largest inguinal node was 4.1 cm by 2.4 cm showing increased FDG avidity.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: On follow-up imaging studies performed 3 weeks before evaluation, the inguinal lymph nodes had decreased in size to 2.0 cm by 0.6 cm and no longer showed increased FDG avidity.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the upper thighs
radiographic_examinations.findings: Skin thickening along the lateral right thigh showing increased FDG avidity.
